ruleComicContent: importPackage(Packages.org.json);importPackage(Packages.java.lang);importClass(Packages.java.util.ArrayList);importPackage(Packages.com.reader.comic.model);function parseImages(){var list=new ArrayList();var jsonObject1=new JSONObject(content);var getData=new JSONObject(jsonObject1.get("data").toString());var jsonArray=new JSONArray(getData.getString("chapter_list"));for(var j=0;j<jsonArray.length();j++){var object=jsonArray.getJSONObject(j);var chapter_id=object.get("chapter_id").toString();if(chapter_id.equals(path)){var count=Integer.parseInt(object.getString("end_var"));for(var i=0;i<count;i++){var img="http://mhpic.zymkcdn.com/comic/";var img_type=new JSONObject(object.getString("chapter_image"));img=img+img_type.getString("middle");img=img.replace("$$",(i+1)+"");var imageUrl=new ImageUrl(i+1,img,false);list.add(imageUrl)}}}return list};
